misc: Regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results
biography: Sami, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his strategic play and calm demeanor on the course. Representing Hirsala Golf, Sami consistently brings a level of thoughtful precision to the competition that makes him a formidable opponent.

Beyond the Hector Trophée, Sami regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour, demonstrating a continued commitment to competitive golf. While the quest for a Hector Trophée or Victor Trophy title continues, Sami's dedication and sportsmanship remain unwavering.

With six past appearances and anticipation building for Hector Trophée 2025, where Sami will be making his seventh appearance, the golf community eagerly watches to see if this will be the year he finally claims one of the coveted titles.
